formalpara.title: Identify architectural assets
formalpara.para: Identify and analyze architectural assets applicable to the software, including existing domain models, reference architectures, components, communication protocols, standards, and design strategies and conventions.

glossdef.para: Record the asset analysis in the Software Architecture work product.

formalpara.title: Define a strategy for the software architecture
formalpara.para: Define a strategy for the architecture based on the Software Requirements, the Function Specification, the analysis of the architectural assets, and the requirements derived from higher level system or subsystem design.

glossdef.para: Document the strategy in the Software Architecture.

formalpara.title: Specify the top-level box structure of the software architecture
formalpara.para: Decompose the history-based black box specification of required external behavior defined in the Function Specification into top-level, state-based state box and procedure-based clear box forms based on the architecture strategy.

glossdef.para: For the state box, invent principal state elements and operations required to achieve specified black box behavior.

For the clear box, invent procedures for operations on state elements required to achieve specified state box behavior. Within the clear box, invent and connect principal software components, usually defined as black boxes, whose subsequent state box decompositions will encapsulate state at the next level.
Continue the decomposition until the architecture is fully elaborated.
The completed software architecture represents hierarchies of box uses, wherein every use of a box is represented explicitly in a hierarchy.
Document the architecture in the Software Architecture work product.

formalpara.title: Analyze and validate the software architecture
formalpara.para: Perform simulations and analysis as necessary to ensure that performance, reliability, usability, and other software requirements can be met by the architecture.

glossdef.para: Document the analysis in the Software Architecture work product.
